author: Home Repair Tutor
description: How to tile around shower valves…just one way to do it.  I cut 1/8” slivers in the tile then polish it with a large chamfer cone. I back flat trowel the tile with mortar then add more to the wall before setting it. Visit homerepairtutor.com to see more tile shower tips 🔥#bathroomremodel #tileshower #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: How to Tile Around Shower Valves - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
